00068     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00069     const ColourValue PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getBase (const Real mX, const Real mZ)
00070     {
00071         if (mBase != 0)
00072         {
00073             unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((mZ * mBase->getWidth() + mX) * 4);//4 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00074             if (mBase->getSize () > Pos)
00075             {
00076                 const Real divider = 1.0f / 255;
00077                 return ColourValue((Real) mBase->getData()[ Pos + 0] * divider,
00078                                 (Real) mBase->getData()[ Pos + 1] * divider,
00079                                 (Real) mBase->getData()[ Pos + 2] * divider,
00080                                 (Real) mBase->getData()[ Pos + 3] * divider);
00081             }
00082             else
00083             {
00084                 return ColourValue::White;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         else
00088         {
00089             return ColourValue::White;
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     const ColourValue PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getCoverage (const Real mX, const Real mZ)
00095     {
00096         if (mCoverage != 0)
00097         {
00098             unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((mZ * mCoverage->getWidth()  + mX) * 4);//4 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00099             if (mCoverage->getSize () > Pos)
00100             {
00101                 const Real divider = 1.0f / 255;
00102                 return ColourValue((Real) mCoverage->getData()[ Pos + 0] * divider,
00103                                 (Real) mCoverage->getData()[ Pos + 1] * divider,
00104                                 (Real) mCoverage->getData()[ Pos + 2] * divider,
00105                                 (Real) mCoverage->getData()[ Pos + 3] * divider);
00106             }
00107             else
00108             {
00109                 return ColourValue::White;
00110             }
00111         }
00112         else
00113         {
00114             return ColourValue::White;
00115         }
00116     }

00118     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getShadow (const Real mX, const Real mZ,
00120                                                             const bool &positive)
00121     {
00122         if (mShadow != 0)
00123         {
00124             unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((mZ * mShadow->getWidth() + mX) * 3);//3 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00125             if (mShadow->getSize () > Pos)
00126             {
00127                 if (positive)
00128                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 0]) / 255;
00129                 else
00130                     return static_cast<Real> (mShadow->getData()[ Pos + 1]) / 255;
00131             }
00132             else
00133             {
00134                 return 0.0f;
00135             }
00136         }
00137         else
00138         {
00139             return 0.0f;
00140         }
00141     }

00143     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getNormal (const Real x, const Real z)
00145     {
00146         #ifndef _LOADEDNORM
00147             return PagingLandScapeData2D::getNormal(x,z);
00148         #else
00149             if (mImage)
00150             {
00151                 unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((z * mSize  + x) * mBpp);//4 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00152 
00153                 if (mMax > Pos)
00154                 {
00155                     const Real normalscale = 1.0f / 127.0f;
00156                     return Vector3 (((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 0]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00157                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 1]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00158                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 2]) - 128.0f) * normalscale);
00159                 }
00160                 else
00161                 {
00162                     return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00163                 }
00164             }
00165             else
00166             {
00167                 return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00168             }
00169         #endif //_NOLOAD
00170     }
00171     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00172     Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getScale() const
00173     {        
00174         Real prescale;
00175         switch (mBpp)
00176         {
00177             case 1:
00178                 prescale = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y / 255;
00179                 break;
00180             case 2:
00181                                 prescale = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y / 65535;
00182                 break;
00183             case 3:
00184                                 prescale = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y / 16777215;
00185                 break;
00186             case 4:
00187                                 prescale = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y / 16777215;
00188                 break;
00189             default:
00190                 OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00191                     "unrecongnized number of bpp for data src image.", 
00192                     "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getScale");
00193                 break;
00194         }
00195         return prescale;
00196         }
00197         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00198         Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getInvScale() const
00199         {        
00200                 Real prescale;
00201                 switch (mBpp)
00202                 {
00203                 case 1:
00204                         prescale = 255.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00205                         break;
00206                 case 2:
00207                         prescale = 65535.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00208                         break;
00209                 case 3:
00210                         prescale = 16777215.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00211                         break;
00212                 case 4:
00213                         prescale = 16777215.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00214                         break;
00215                 default:
00216                         OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00217                                 "unrecongnized number of bpp for data src image.", 
00218                                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::getScale");
00219                         break;
00220                 }
00221                 return prescale;
00222         }
00223     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00224     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_save()
00225     {
00226         const Real scale = getInvScale();
00227                 const size_t bpp = mBpp;
00228 
00229                 size_t j = 0;
00230                 uchar * ogre_restrict data = mImage->getData();
00231                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMaxArrayPos; i++)
00232                 {             
00233                         switch (bpp)
00234                         {  
00235                         case 1:
00236                                 data[j] = uchar (mHeightData[i] * scale);
00237                         break;
00238                         case 2:
00239                         case 3:
00240                         case 4:
00241                                 {
00242                                         const ushort syn = ushort  (mHeightData[i] * scale);
00243                                         #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00244                                                 data[j] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00245                                                 data[j+ 1] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00246                                         #else
00247                                                 data[j] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00248                                                 data[j+ 1] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00249                                         #endif
00250                                 }
00251                                 break;
00252                         default:
00253                                 assert(0);
00254                                 OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00255                                         "unrecognized bpp image.", 
00256                                         "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_save");
00257                                 break;
00258                         }
00259                         j += bpp;            
00260                 }
00261 
00262         const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." +
00263                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00264                                                 StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00265         const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00266 
00267 
00268        FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00269              mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00270              fname + extname);
00271        FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00272        if (it != finfo->end())
00273         {
00274             //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00275             char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00276             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00277             mImage->save (fname + "modif." + extname);
00278             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00279             RetablishDir (olddir);
00280         }
00281     }
00282     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00283     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00284     {
00285         const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00286         const String pageName = "." + StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00287                                     StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00288         const String &fileExt = opt->LandScape_extension;
00289         const String &groupName = opt->groupName;
00290         const String strFileName = opt->LandScape_filename + pageName;
00291         
00292                 mImage = new Image();
00293         if (!(opt->Deformable && 
00294             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(groupName, strFileName + "modif." + fileExt)))
00295         {      
00296             if (!ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(groupName, strFileName + fileExt))
00297             {
00298                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(
00299                                 String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + strFileName + fileExt, 
00300                                 LML_CRITICAL,
00301                                 true);
00302                 return false;
00303             }
00304             mImage->load (strFileName + fileExt, groupName); 
00305         }
00306         else
00307         {
00308             mImage->load (strFileName + "modif." + fileExt, groupName); 
00309         }
00310 
00311                 //check to make sure it's 2^n + 1 size.
00312                 if (mImage->getWidth() != mImage->getHeight() || 
00313             !_checkSize(mImage->getWidth()))
00314                 {
00315                         String err = "Error: Invalid height map size : " +
00316                                 StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getWidth())) +
00317                                 "," + StringConverter::toString(static_cast <unsigned int> (mImage->getHeight())) +
00318                                 ". Should be 2^n+1, 2^n+1";
00319                         OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, err, 
00320                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00321                 }
00322 
00323         mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00324         const unsigned int bpp = static_cast <unsigned int> (mBpp);
00325                 if (mSize != mImage->getWidth())
00326                 {
00327                         OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00328                 "Error: Declared World size <> Height Map Size.",  
00329                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00330                 }
00331 
00332         if (opt->coverage_vertex_color)
00333         {
00334             mCoverage = new Image();
00335             mCoverage->load (opt->LandScape_filename + ".Coverage" + pageName + fileExt, 
00336                                 groupName);
00337 
00338         }
00339         if (opt->base_vertex_color)
00340         {
00341             mBase = new Image();
00342             mBase->load(opt->LandScape_filename + ".Base" + pageName + fileExt, 
00343                             groupName);
00344         }
00345 
00346         if (opt->vertex_shadowed)
00347         {
00348             mShadow = new Image();
00349             mShadow->load(opt->LandScape_filename + ".HS" + pageName + fileExt, 
00350                             groupName);
00351         }
00352 
00353         mXDimension = mImage->getWidth() * bpp;
00354         mZDimension = mImage->getHeight() * bpp;
00355         mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize * bpp);
00356         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize);
00357         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00358 
00359         const Real scale = getScale();
00360 
00361         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00362         const uchar * const ogre_restrict imagedata = mImage->getData();
00363         const unsigned int maxminusone = mMax;
00364 
00365         Real h;
00366         unsigned int j = 0;
00367         Real * const ogre_restrict heightField = mHeightData;
00368         for (unsigned int src_pos = 0; src_pos < maxminusone;  src_pos += bpp)
00369         {
00370             switch (bpp)
00371             {
00372             case 1:
00373                 h = imagedata[src_pos] * scale;
00374                 break;
00375                         case 2:
00376                         case 3:
00377                         case 4:
00378                 {
00379                     #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00380                         ushort val = imagedata[src_pos] << 8;
00381                         val += imagedata[src_pos + 1];
00382                     #else
00383                         ushort val = imagedata[src_pos];
00384                         val += imagedata[src_pos + 1] << 8;
00385                     #endif
00386                                     h = val * scale;
00387                 }
00388                                 break;
00389             default:
00390                 assert(0);
00391                 OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00392                     "unrecongnized bpp image.", 
00393                     "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00394                 break;
00395             }
00396             mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00397             heightField[j++] = h;
00398         }
00399         return true;
00400     }
00401 
00402     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00403     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load()
00404     {
00405                 mImage = new Image();
00406         mImage->load (mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00407                 "." + mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension, mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00408         mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00409 
00410         mXDimension = mImage->getWidth();
00411         mZDimension = mImage->getHeight();
00412 
00413         const size_t sourceHeight = mZDimension;
00414         const size_t sourceWidth = mXDimension;
00415 
00416         computePowerof2PlusOneSize ();     
00417 
00418                 mSize = mXDimension;
00419         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension * mZDimension);
00420         mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mMaxArrayPos * mBpp);
00421         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00422 
00423 
00424         const unsigned int bpp = static_cast <unsigned int> (mBpp);
00425         const Real scale = getScale();
00426 
00427         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00428         const uchar * ogre_restrict imagedata = mImage->getData();
00429         const unsigned int maxminusone = mMax;
00430         const unsigned int shift_fill = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension - sourceWidth);
00431 
00432         Real h; 
00433         unsigned int dest_pos = 0;
00434         unsigned int src_pos = 0;
00435                 Real * const ogre_restrict heightField = mHeightData;
00436         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sourceHeight; ++i)
00437         {
00438             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sourceWidth; ++j)
00439             {  
00440                 switch (bpp)
00441                 {
00442                     case 1:
00443                         h = imagedata[src_pos] * scale;
00444                         break;
00445                                         case 2:
00446                                         case 3:
00447                                         case 4:
00448                         {
00449                             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00450                                 ushort val = imagedata[src_pos] << 8;
00451                                 val += imagedata[src_pos + 1];
00452                             #else
00453                                 ushort val = imagedata[src_pos];
00454                                 val += imagedata[src_pos + 1] << 8;
00455                             #endif
00456                                             h = val * scale;
00457                         }
00458                         break;
00459                     default:
00460                         assert(0);
00461                         OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00462                             "unrecongnized bpp image.", 
00463                             "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00464                         break;
00465                 }
00466                 //DEBUG_OUTPUT ( " Bpp " << StringConverter::toString (h)  << "\n";
00467                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00468                 heightField[dest_pos++] = h;
00469                 src_pos += bpp;
00470             }
00471             memset (&heightField[dest_pos], 0, shift_fill);
00472             dest_pos += shift_fill; 
00473         }
00474     }
00475     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00476     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_unload()
00477     {
00478             delete mImage;
00479             mImage = 0;
00480         delete mCoverage;
00481         mCoverage = 0;
00482         delete mBase;
00483         mBase = 0;
00484         delete mShadow;
00485         mShadow = 0;
00486     }
